frameDefinitions: An intentional Agent or a causing event (Cause) event causes a Theme which is already in motion to take a different Path or Direction, or reach a different Goal than the Original_path.
An Event with multiple Participants takes place.
An Agent is described as pursuing an Activity, expending some effort.

A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.
Two individuals, the Subordinate and the Superior have a relationship such that the Subordinate generally follows orders given by the Superior and has the best interests of the Superior in mind.

An Item is located at the top end of a scale of importance or social rank (or some other Attribute) in comparison to other members of a Contrast_set (usually, implicit) that is otherwise similar in kind to the Item.
frameExamples:
The hotel business didn't last - especially after the construction of a railroad
<t>diverted</t> travelers a few miles west to what is now the village of Eagle
MATAC looks forward to your <t>participation</t> in helping promote telework in the Mid-Atlantic region.
Sky, a Korean War veteran, was <t>active</t> in his opposition to Vietnam and continues to protest current combat in Iraq.
Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.
The archduke and several of his <t><fex name='Subordinate'>henchmen</fex></t> got out of the carriage, looking around nervously.
The <t>main</t> problem is that the administration has not yet clarified 'Regime change.' INI
listRoleDefinitions: The entity that is in motion, and changes path due to the action of an Agent or due to a Cause.

The route that the <fen>Theme</fen> was originally headed for.  In cases when the <fen>Theme</fen> is an intentional actor or is controlled by an intentional actor, the <fen>Original_path</fen> correlates with the (former) plan of the actor.  In other cases, the <fen>Original_path</fen> corresponds to what would be expected for the path of the <fen>Theme</fen> from general principles or physics.  (In some cases, the <fen>Original_path</fen> may indicate the intended destination, and not just the path, of the <fen>Theme</fen>.)
The <fen>Path</fen> refers to (a part of) the ground over which the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up travelling after being diverted.
The location the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up in after being redirected.

This role is used for expressions that indicate motion along a line from the current deitic center towards a reference point (which may be implicit) that does not necessarily correspond to the <fen>Goal</fen>.  Often <fen>Direction</fen> is defined with reference to the canonical orientation of the <fen>Theme</fen>, the orientation imposed by an implicit observer, or the inherent orientation of the scene.
An individual that determines the change in course of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
An event that brings about the change in the <fen>Path</fen> of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the redirection of motion occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location at which the redirection occurs.
The individuals or entities that have been participants in an <fen>Event</fen>.
<fen>Participant_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
A grammatically less prominent participant of an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
An <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>, who may or may not be involved intentionally.
A group, location, or institution conventionally associated with an <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the multiple-participant <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
The location where the <fen>Event</fen> involving multiple <fen>Participants</fen> occurs.
This role identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
An entity acted upon by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
This role identifies the role filled by the <fen>Agent</fen> which is saliently associated with an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the  <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
<fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
The individual in charge of the <fen>Subordinate</fen>.
The individual under the command of the <fen>Superior</fen>.
An <fen>Item</fen> is the foremost thing in the <fen>Contrast_set</fen>.
This role identifies the domain (usually temporally or spatially defined) within which the <fen>Item</fen> is primary among its kind.
The <fen>Contrast_set</fen> is a group of entities similar to the <fen>Item</fen> out of which the <fen>Item</fen> is the most preeminent.
listRoleExamples: VTA detoured motorists <fex>from southbound I-880</fex> onto Airport Boulevard to access Coleman Avenue.
Traffic was redirected Tuesday <fex>along Melrose Avenue</fex> to make way for the scoreboard columns, Mellecker said.
Not knowing any better, he redirected people <fex>to the city center</fex>.
Flight 93 left Newark, NJ, earlier that day, bound for San Francisco, but it was hijacked by four terrorists who diverted it <fex>back toward Washington, DC</fex> .
When we ended up over in Marrakech, or Dakar, <fex>they</fex> diverted us up to Tobruk.

We even got a bonus morning in Tokyo's international airport when <fex>a bad storm</fex>
diverted us on the way to Asia.
<fex>Last Tuesday</fex> they were detouring everybody down onto 5th avenue .
They redirected us <fex name=''>at the corner of Alstone and Bokchoy Avenue</fex>.
Thereafter, <fex>everybody</fex> participated in the 17 May parade ending in the Nordic Club.
Last year, <fex>Bill</fex> participated in the Montana State University Earth Systems Science distance learning course in the Atmosphere Unit.

The Second Amended Complaint alleges that Andrew S. Pitt ('Pitt'), Conectisys Corporation ('Conectisys' or the 'Company'), and BM
Capital Corp. participated <fex>with Zaman and Smith Benton</fex> in a fraudulent and manipulative trading scheme.
Some who participated <fex>in D-Day</fex> are finally ready to talk about it
Several of the countries were unable to participate <fex>in the market</fex> .

A survey of students who participated <fex>last year</fex> showed that 61 percent would be the
first in their family to attend college.
The most exciting tours for Mr. Osako were when he participated <fex>in France, Belgium, Holland, Cuba and Japan</fex>.
He is always active <fex>demolishing the painted figures of men's faith</fex> and then is astonished to find the faith still there clothed in new figure.
<fex>He</fex> was active for six decades as a painter, graphic designer and theorist of art and design.
<fex>As many as 324 companies' stocks</fex> were active across the board.
Jacques Fuller has been active <fex>as a sculptor</fex> in Bloemfontein for almost two decades.
Commercial selling was active <fex>yesterday</fex> but a lack of interest allowed the market to push sharply higher into the mid-session.
He is retired from Whirlpool Corp. in Clyde and is active <fex>at the YMCA</fex>.
<fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.
The foremost band <fex>in the world of the 1960's</fex> was clearly the Beatles.
Our discussion has raised a number of issues, foremost <fex>among them</fex> time.
